input.sentences: the eldest members of the family read off the names of all present .
one of the women cooked in a trash can on an open fire .
while grandpa entertained the youngest members of the family .
a good time was had by all who attended the family reunion .
output.sentences: Everyone in the family had their names on the reunion list.
The cousins enjoyed playing games together.
Aunt June kept everyone well fed by boiling seafood.
The grandkids were so happy to be with their grandpa.
Everyone loved getting together at the family reunion.
